# Bibliography

Associate professor (Maître de conférences) at INSA Lyon, France, since September 2023, and a member of the PSPM team at Institut Camille Jordan. I defended my Ph.D under the supervision of Ali Gannoun and Lionel Cucala at University of Montpellier in November, 2021.
